Instruction: Start Marathon between T1/T2
Make a Right into Adarsh Palm Retreat Phase 3
Make a right turn into Phase 3 Main road
Make a left on to Lane 1S
Make a U turn
Make a right turn into the Phase 3 Main Road
Make a left towards the Phase 3 exit gate
Exit the gate and proceed straight to Adarsh Clubhouse Road ( stay left side of the road)
Make a left onto APR Villas main road  ( stay left side of the road)
Make a left after passing the lake on your right  ( stay left side of the road)
Make a right onto the main road ( stay left side of the road)
Make a right at the Bay and move straight along the road  ( stay left side of the road)
Take a U turn and travel back on same road - near Villa Entrance near Intel ( stay right side of the road)
Make a right turn into the first RMZ buidling  on the right
Make a left within RMZ
Make a left within RMZ
Exit  RMZ  by moving zig zag, left right, left right quickly
Make a right onto main road ( stay right side of the road)
Go Straight towards the T Junction
